tasks.fullContent:
# Execute Kinlet Phase 1 GTM (Week 1)

**ID:** 001  
**Goal:** Kinlet - Achieve 20-30 signups by end of week  
**Priority:** High  
**Created:** 2026-02-22  
**Due:** 2026-02-28  
**Status:** Backlog  

## Description

Execute Phase 1 GTM for Kinlet:
- Post 3 Reddit microguides (sundowning, facility transitions, med battles)
- Send 15 personalized DMs to "Dr. Faye" prospects
- Email 9 existing signups with referral links
- Monitor engagement daily

## Context

MVP launched with 9 waitlist signups. Week 1 goal: 35-49 total signups through targeted outreach on Reddit + DMs + email.

**Materials ready:**
- ✅ Reddit microguides
- ✅ DM templates
- ✅ Email template
- ✅ Execution roadmap

## Next Actions

1. Post Reddit guides (today/tomorrow)
2. Send first batch of DMs
3. Email existing signups
4. Track signup sources
5. Daily monitoring

## Metrics

- Target: 35-49 total signups
- Current: 9
- Success: >20 new signups this week

- Deploy AMS screener + trade engine (verified working)
- Activate macro regime monitoring
- Launch
tasks.fullContent:
# Launch Live Trading System

**ID:** 002  
**Goal:** Swing Trading - Begin live trading with new rules  
**Priority:** Critical  
**Created:** 2026-02-22  
**Due:** 2026-02-24  
**Status:** Backlog  

## Description

Launch live trading system Monday 7:30 AM MT:

- Liquidate all 75 existing positions for clean slate
- Deploy AMS screener + trade engine (verified working)
- Activate macro regime monitoring
- Launch policy news monitoring (TIER 1)
- Monitor first day for anomalies
- Begin daily portfolio email tracking (4 PM MT)

## Context

All systems verified and tested. Trading rules complete (TRADING_RULES.md). Support systems ready: Kelly Criterion, volatility sizing, rebalancing monitor.

**Status:** ✅ All systems ready
**Blockers:** None
**Risk:** First day execution - monitor closely

## Next Actions

1. Pre-market Sunday night: Final verification
2. Monday 7:30 AM: Market opens, screener starts
3. 4:00 PM: First portfolio email
4. Friday 5 PM: First performance review

## Metrics

- TIER 1 success: System stays online, positions entered cleanly
- Win rate target: >55% after 10 trades
- Daily loss limit: -$1,350 (hard stop)

tasks.fullContent:
# Job Search Week 1: Warm Intro Requests

**ID:** 003  
**Goal:** Job Search - Schedule 2-3 conversations by Friday  
**Priority:** High  
**Created:** 2026-02-22  
**Due:** 2026-03-01  
**Status:** Backlog  

## Description

Execute Week 1 job search outreach:

- Request warm intros to top 5 target companies (Figma, Anthropic, OpenAI, Databricks, Gusto)
- Document intro requests + timeline
- Prepare positioning narrative (3 versions ready)
- Schedule any intro calls that come through
- Begin recruiter outreach (Anthropic, OpenAI)

## Context

**Target roles:** Head of Design Operations, VP/Director of Design, Principal Design Technologist

**Top 5 targets ranked:**
1. Figma (22/20 score)
2. Databricks (Denver)
3. Gusto (Denver)
4. Anthropic
5. OpenAI

**Materials ready:**
- ✅ Positioning narratives (3 versions)
- ✅ Company research summaries
- ✅ Warm intro templates
- ✅ Interview story arc

## Next Actions

1. Request warm intros (Tuesday)
2. Recruiter outreach (Wednesday)
3. Take any scheduled calls (Thu-Fri)
4. Document feedback + insights
5. Plan Phase 2

## Metrics

- Success: 2-3 conversations scheduled
- Warm intros: 5 requested
- Recruiter responses: Monitor Inbox

tasks.fullContent:
# Cultivate: Dashboard Metrics & Reporting

**ID:** 004  
**Goal:** Cultivate - Track and optimize SaaS pipeline  
**Priority:** Medium  
**Created:** 2026-02-22  
**Due:** 2026-03-01  
**Status:** Backlog  

## Description

Set up metrics dashboard for Cultivate:

- Update discovery pipeline with current opportunities (target: 8-10)
- Establish validation scoring threshold (8.0 minimum)
- Build weekly review process
- Create performance tracking dashboard
- Automate metric updates to Mission Control

## Context

Cultivate is the SaaS business operating system with 30-agent engine. Current focus: discovery → validation → build pipeline.

**Current status:**
- 8 items in discovery
- 6 in validation
- 34 in backlog

## Next Actions

1. Review all discovery items for pipeline health
2. Score validation candidates
3. Update Mission Control dashboard
4. Plan Phase 2 features

## Metrics

- Discovery score health: All >8.0
- Validation success rate: >70%
- Weekly velocity: Track tasks moved through pipeline

tasks.title: Test Ollama Mistral 7B Integration with OpenClaw
tasks.goal: Infrastructure - Evaluate local AI model as cost-saving fallback
tasks.description:
Evaluate and integrate Ollama Mistral 7B as OpenClaw fallback model:

- Test Mistral 7B on common tasks (summarization, brainstorming, code review)
- Benchmark latency vs. cloud APIs (Claude, GPT)
- D
tasks.fullContent:
# Test Ollama Mistral 7B Integration with OpenClaw

**ID:** 005  
**Goal:** Infrastructure - Evaluate local AI model as cost-saving fallback  
**Priority:** Medium  
**Created:** 2026-02-22  
**Due:** 2026-03-10  
**Status:** Backlog  

## Description

Evaluate and integrate Ollama Mistral 7B as OpenClaw fallback model:

- Test Mistral 7B on common tasks (summarization, brainstorming, code review)
- Benchmark latency vs. cloud APIs (Claude, GPT)
- Document best use cases for local execution
- Configure as fallback in OpenClaw agent config
- Create cost-benefit analysis

## Context

Mistral 7B successfully tested (3.3s response time). Running on Mac mini locally. Potential to reduce API costs for non-critical tasks.

**Current status:** ✅ Model downloaded and tested
**Blockers:** None
**Opportunity:** Integrate into agent workflow for 24/7 low-cost inference

## Next Actions

1. Run performance benchmarks on 10-20 prompts
2. Compare latency/cost vs. Claude/GPT
3. Document best use cases
4. Update agent config with fallback
5. Monitor for production readiness

## Metrics

- Latency target: <5s for most tasks
- Cost savings: Track API call reduction
- Quality: Subjective assessment vs. cloud models
